extends java.lang.Object
    Class that encapsulates selenium web driver (local and remote)

      • process

        public CaptureResult process(java.lang.String url,
                    boolean screenshot,
                    boolean segmentation)
        Execute a capture from a current browser instance. This function is a adaptation from the getScreenShotWithTimeout() method from BrowserShot_mapred proyect
        Parameters:
        url - the web page to capture
        screenshot - indicates if a page screenshot should be taken
        segmentation - indicates if the segmentation should be done
        Returns:
        CaptureResult the result of the capture

        Parameters:

        segmentation - indicates if the segmentation should be done
